title: Cardano bulls struggling, Everlodge reaches new all-time high

title: Solana hits records for monthly new and active addresses
description: The Solana network recorded the number of new and active addresses in December. According to The Block, the number of active Solana network addresses increased by about 50% compared to November. It exceeded 15.6 million, more than the previous 15.2…

title: Ledger Addresses Security Vulnerability Incident, Assures Users of Compensation for $600,000 in Losses
description: Following the attack last week, Ledger has released a statement acknowledging the breach and pledging to patch up its platform to prevent similar incidents in the future. The wallet announced that it will “make sure victims affected will be made whole” and is shifting from Blind Signing to Clear Signing starting June next year. Ledger [...]
